[Planck.js API Doc](../README.md) › [Globals](../globals.md) › [Solver](solver.md)

# Class: Solver

Finds and solves islands. An island is a connected subset of the world.

## Hierarchy

* **Solver**

## Index

### Constructors

* [constructor](solver.md#constructor)
